name: Dungeons & Dice (Prototype)
description:
Prototype

This is a super rough prototype I made to try and get across the concept. It's pretty shallow and missing ... well a game. But the core loop basically works and get across the idea. There's only one floor in the dungeon and there's no way to restart so just reboot the game to reload. 

Concept

Play as an adventurer going into a dungeon with a big bag of dice. Use dice to complete combat encounters, open locks and trade for items. Dice can have a standard value or be a special type like bombs or keys that are used for special actions.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Use the mouse to interface with the UI
